reviews.review_msg: One of the best profs up at SFU. He's very approachable and enjoys talking with students unlike some profs. He made bisc 329 an enjoyable/fun class which is very impressive.

Now here is a guy that most profs should be like.  Doug goes above and beyond the call of duty.  He is willing to answer questions and will help you until you understand the concepts.  Keep up the great work!!!
